title: Smokey Joe's revenge
brief_description: When nasty old Mr. Williams replaces his ols steam engine with a new model, three local children repair and restore the old engine (Smokey Joe). They win first prize at the steam engine fair, but Mr. Williams takes the trophy, claiming Smokey Joe is his engine. But Smokey Joe has plans of his own.
